item.title: Tips and Tricks in LaTex
item.description: This post continuously updating. This post includes some tips for writing an essay individually or in a group using LaTex. The best practice posts and other recommendations in my weblog are local best practice, so better ways probably exist and I don’t know about them until now, please write about them and share them with me. Such posts aim to share my way of doing this procedure without repeating it.

item.title: Quick tip: email obfuscation
item.description: Accessibility and email obfuscation Have you ever seen people try to hide their emails from crawlers and spammers like this: name [at] domain [dot] com It’s surprising to use this method to hide the email address from dishonorable spammers as they master these methods for a long time. These techniques have one primary problem, and that is “They haven’t any concern about accessibility, usability, and inclusion.” Suppose people with vision disabilities can’t access your email through obfuscating it in an image or how hard it is for a person with a mobility disability.
